name: Guarded
description: +1 minion

name: Thorned
description: melee dmg is 50% reflected

name: Reflective
description: proj dmg is 50% reflected

name: Consuming
description: 5' around boss deals lvl $dmgType dmg and heals boss same amount

name: Claustrophobic
description: new arena action: 20' of the arena's edges grows an area of lvl+2 $dmgType dmg which heals boss for same amount dealt

name: Slippery
description: players can either move 1 space or their full sp

name: Flanking
description: players take +50% dmg when flanked

name: Flooding
description: new arena action (all water magically only affects players): water around waist (diff terrain) --> water around shoulders (swimming) --> water above head (swimming + no breath)

name: Hexed
description: on player turn start, get random condi until start of their next turn (source is boss if relevant)

name: Evasive
description: 1/turn, boss halves 1st incoming dmg

name: Adaptive
description: boss reflects 50% dmg of the type used to dmg them last

name: Mirrored
description: new arena action: boss copies action of last player's turn as legendary w/ same stats (but still new rolls)

name: Corroding
description: on hitting boss, offending power has its dmg halved until end combat (can stack)

name: Frigid
description: sacred fire spawns over 1st player, moves 5' in random dir each turn start, leaving its 10' radius causes lvl cold dmg

name: Burning
description: 6 unlit torches around room, new arena action: random torch is lit. On player turn start, for each torch above 1 lit, take fire dmg. Snuff adj torch as action

name: Unstable
description: casting spells causes arcane backlash, dealing lvl force dmg

name: Conductive
description: on hitting boss, offending creature sparks out at all allies within 10' of them for lvl light dmg

name: Pitch Black
description: if player is in darkness, take lvl nec dmg, area has no light source

name: Venomous
description: when boss hits player, drop 3x3 pers area of lvl psn dmg beneath player (they are immune until end of their next turn)

name: Linked
description: in init order, each player is linked to the next, if not within 10' of linked, take lvl psy dmg

name: Blinding
description: if player is not in darkness, take lvl rad dmg, area has no light source

name: Deafening
description: on weapon hit, strike rings out at offender, dealing lvl thunder dmg

name: Webbed
description: on init, and then each arena action, crackling web of energy starts forming at either ground-, mid-, or overhead-lvl, start of next rnd a pers area fully forms, dealing lvl $dmgType dmg at that height, until end of that rnd

name: Ritualistic
description: 3 bloody ritual circles around area, each arena turn they all intensify, if one reaches 3rd stage, boss gets either +1 AC, heals 30% HP, +1 to all saves, +1 AB, +1 to DCs, or +2 flat dmg and circle resets. action to reset circle.

name: Trapped
description: each space (other than starting spaces for players) has hidden floor trap, can be deactivated if hit directly (auto) or if stepped on, which deals lvl+2 $dmgType dmg
